channel.title: Problem with run.bat
channel.description:
Hey guys I got a prob with my run.bat.. it works on my computer when i run it but on my vps when i run it, it opens c:\windows\java.. and it is a file folder that it opens and it has trustlib or something and something else..Idk why but here is my run.bat code.. maybe someone could give me a different one.. i am using pkplanet source..
[code]@echo off title Splinter-X Start java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
If you know any other sources better than that if theres not any way to solve this.. then please tell me any other source if you can't solve this.. I will rep+++ when i get 15 rep :D thanks!

item.title: Problem with run.bat
item.dc:creator: @jake_cake jake cake
item.description:
@jake_cake wrote:

what u mean? i downloaded no-ip and all that… the no-ip that i use on my computer

so any help?? i really need to get this up…

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with run.bat
item.dc:creator: @jake_cake jake cake
item.description:
@jake_cake wrote:

Dude yay omg! ty! i got it! there was run.bat in bin and a shortcut for it… the shortcut don’t work but the one in the bin does!!! ty i would rep++ if i could!@

Oh well ain’t that great… run.bat works now but when i put it on it says your server is now online… but when i try to connect to the ip it wont work… it only works off my comp… not the vps any help?

Read full topic

Is it server.class? Server.class? Java is case sensitive.

@jake_cake wrote:

Alright… I’ll check that guide how to start a server or w/e again but i’m pretty sure i got them right… i’ll double check

It says the same thing… if either of you have teamviewer tell me and i’ll pm you my id and pw… I need to get this fixed soon cause I need to put it on my vps cuz i’m leaving soon.

Any help?? or did i just waste 25$ for nothing?

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with run.bat
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“jake cake, post:9, topic:351512”]Before I added the pause it would just open and close… now when i added the pause it says this…

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

It can’t find the server class. Make sure your path for the server class is correct and its casing.

Read full topic

@deathschaos9 wrote:

If thats not working, that use a direct path
@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\java.exe” server
Or similar…
